mapper.select: SELECT visit_date ,visit_mcount mtoday ,visit_nonmcount nonmtoday ,visit_mcount + visit_nonmcount AS todaytotal FROM visit WHERE visit_date = curdate()
SELECT count(*) AS board_today FROM board WHERE date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d') = curdate()
SELECT count(*) AS reply_today FROM reply WHERE date_format(regdate,'%Y-%m-%d') = curdate()
